name: Obstetrics and Gynecology
details: Covers women's reproductive health and pregnancy-related care

name: Nephrology
details: Focuses on kidney function and related disorders

name: Gastroenterology
details: Diagnoses and treats digestive system disorders

name: Orthopedics
details: Specializes in musculoskeletal disorders and surgical procedures

name: Dermatology
details: Concerned with skin, hair, and nail disorders

name: Psychiatry
details: Treats mental health disorders and provides psychological counseling

name: Pediatrics
details: Provides medical care for infants, children, and adolescents

name: Oncology
details: Deals with cancer diagnosis, treatment, and management

name: Neurology
details: Focuses on disorders and diseases affecting the brain, spinal cord, and nervous system

name: Cardiology
details: Specializes in diagnosing and treating heart conditions

name: Accidents & Emergency
details: Responsible for accidents and emergency attentions
